column1: Genie
But oh, to be free. To be my own master. Such a thing would be greater than all the magic and all the treasures in all the world
Oi! Ten thousand years will give you such a crick in the neck
Aladdin! Hello, Aladdin, nice to have you on the show. Can we call you Al, or maybe just Din? Or how about Laddie
Say, you're a lot smaller than my last master. Either that, or I'm getting bigger. Look at me from the side. Do I look different to you
Yo, Rugman! Haven't seen you in a few millennia. Give me some tassel
Right here, direct from the lamp. Right here for your very much wish-fulfillment. Thank you
Thank you for choosing Magic Carpet for all your travel needs. Don't stand until the rug has come to a complete stop. Thank you. Goodbye now
First, that fez and vest combo is much too third century. These patches. What are we trying to say? Beggar? No
Talk about your trunk space. Check this action out
I can't believe it. I'm losing to a rug
All right, Sparky, here's the deal. If you wanna court the little lady, you gotta be a straight shooter. Do ya got it
Tell her the truth
Enough about you, Casanova. Talk about her
Stop her! Stop her! Want me to sting her
Never fails. You get in the bath and there's a rub at the lamp
I'm getting kinda fond of you, kid not tht I wanna pick out urtains or anything
Tonight the part of AI will be played by a tall dark sinister ugly man
Do you mind if I kiss the monkey.  Oh, Hairball
Al, I can't help you I work for Senor Psychopath now
Jafar, Jafar he's our man if he can't do it GREAT
I'm history, no I'm mythology nah, I don't care what I am I am free-hee
